A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ‘Star Wars: The Last Jedi’ is another epic and satisfying entry in the Skywalker saga where director Rian Johnson touches all the nostalgic bases\, and then wipes them all in the past to push the story forward in new ways\, all the while reminding the fans that Star Wars is allowed to be funny too\, and Mark Hamill deserves more credit.
